thread.title: BRIEF-Amida Capital acquires 1.5 mln of Edison shares
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Amida Capital acquires 1.5 mln of Edison shares

title: BRIEF-Amida Capital acquires 1.5 mln of Edison shares
text:
BRIEF-Amida Capital acquires 1.5 mln of Edison shares Sept 2 
Sept 2 Edison SA : 
* Said on Tuesday that following the company's conditional capital increase, Amida Capital Sp. z o.o. SKA acquired 1.5 million of the company's series L shares at the issue price of 1 zloty each 
* To buy the shares, Amida Capital exercised subscription warrants acquired on Aug. 31 
Source text for Eikon: 
($1 = 3.7664 zlotys) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
